bibl.title: A Recent Suggestion about the Original of Plautus' Aulularia.
bibl.note: À propos de: W. Geoffrey ARNOTT, The Greek Original of Plautus' Aulularia, WS 101 (1988) pp. 181-191; - A Study in Relationships: Alexis' Lebes, Menander's Dyskolos, Plautus' Aulularia, QUCC 62 = N.S., 33 (1989) 3, pp. 27-38. - Le modèle de Plaute est probablement le Dyscolos de Ménandre.
BAIN David, A Recent Suggestion about the Original of Plautus' Aulularia.
